GSD.product_version: versions from v3.0 to before v5.15.80
GSD.description:
ASoC: core: Fix use-after-free in snd_soc_exit()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.80 by commit 34eee4189bcebbd5f6a2ff25ef0cb893ad33d51e, it was introduced in version v3.0 by commit fb257897bf20c5f0e1df584bb5b874e811651263. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: ASoC: core: Fix use-after-free in snd_soc_exit()
